name: code-interpreter
description: Execute JavaScript code in a sandboxed environment using Node.js vm module. Supports capturing console output and enforces a 10-second timeout for safe execution.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: code_interpreter
toolDefinition.description: Execute code in a sandboxed environment. Supports JavaScript (executed via Node.js vm module) and Python (requires python3 binary). Returns captured stdout output and execution metadata.

language.description: The programming language of the code to execute

name: coding-agent
description: A meta-skill that formats structured prompts for the LLM to generate code. Accepts a task description, target language, and optional existing code context to produce a well-structured code generation request.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: coding_agent
toolDefinition.description: Format a structured code generation prompt for the LLM. Provide a task description, target programming language, and optionally existing code to modify or extend. The skill returns a structured prompt that guides the LLM to produce high-quality code.

task.description: A description of what code to generate or what problem to solve

language.description: The target programming language (e.g., javascript, python, typescript, rust, go)

existingCode.description: Optional existing code to modify, extend, or use as context for the generation

name: data-analyzer
description: Analyze JSON data arrays with operations like summary, average, count, filter, sort, and groupBy. Parses JSON input and performs statistical and structural analysis on datasets.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: data_analyzer
toolDefinition.description: Analyze a JSON data array with various operations including summary statistics, averaging numeric fields, counting records, filtering by field values, sorting, and grouping by field.

data.description: JSON string representing an array of objects to analyze

operation.description: The analysis operation to perform on the data

field.description: The field name to operate on (required for average, filter, sort, groupBy)

value.description: The value to filter by (required for filter operation)

order.description: Sort order (used with sort operation, default: asc)

name: deep-research
description: Conduct multi-step research on any topic using DuckDuckGo. Generates search queries, fetches results, and compiles structured reports with summaries, key findings, and sources.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: deep_research
toolDefinition.description: Conduct deep multi-step research on a topic. Generates multiple search queries, fetches results from DuckDuckGo, and compiles a structured report with Summary, Key Findings, and Sources sections.

topic.description: The research topic or question to investigate.

depth.description: Research depth. 'quick' generates 3 queries, 'standard' generates 4, 'deep' generates 5. More queries yield more comprehensive results.

name: discord-bot
description: Interact with the Discord API to send messages, get channel info, and list available channels in a guild.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: discord_bot
toolDefinition.description: Interact with the Discord API. Send messages to channels, get channel details, or list channels in a guild.

action.description: The Discord API action to perform. 'sendMessage' posts a message to a channel, 'getChannel' retrieves channel details, 'listChannels' lists all channels in the channel's guild.

channelId.description: The Discord channel ID. Required for 'sendMessage' and 'getChannel' actions.

content.description: The message content to send when action is 'sendMessage'.

name: email-sender
description: Send emails using the Resend API. Supports sending plain text emails with customizable sender, recipient, subject, and body. Requires a Resend API key.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: email_sender
toolDefinition.description: Send an email using the Resend API. Requires a valid Resend API key. Sends plain text emails to the specified recipient.

from.description: The sender email address (must be a verified domain in Resend)

name: excel-handler
description: Read, write, and analyze CSV files. Supports parsing CSV to JSON, converting JSON data to CSV format, and computing basic statistics on CSV datasets.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: excel_handler
toolDefinition.description: Handle CSV file operations: read a CSV file and parse it to JSON, write JSON data to a CSV file, or analyze a CSV file to compute basic statistics (row count, column names, numeric column stats).

action.description: The action to perform: read (CSV to JSON), write (JSON to CSV), or analyze (compute stats)

filePath.description: The file path of the CSV file to read, write, or analyze

data.description: JSON string of an array of objects to write to CSV (required for write action)

sheetName.description: Optional sheet name label for organizational purposes

name: file-manager
description: Manage files within a sandboxed /data/ directory. Supports reading, writing, listing, and deleting files and directories.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: file_manager
toolDefinition.description: Perform file operations (read, write, list, delete) within the sandboxed /data/ directory. All paths are resolved relative to /data/ and cannot escape it.

action.description: The file operation to perform: read (get file contents), write (create/overwrite file), list (list directory contents), delete (remove file or directory)

path.description: The file or directory path relative to /data/ (e.g., 'notes/todo.txt')

content.description: The content to write to the file (required for write action)

name: knowledge-base
description: In-memory keyword-based knowledge store. Add, search, list, and delete knowledge entries. Search uses TF-IDF-like scoring for relevance ranking.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: knowledge_base
toolDefinition.description: Manage an in-memory knowledge store. Add entries with content and keywords, search by relevance using TF-IDF-like scoring, list all entries, or delete by key.

action.description: The operation: search (find relevant entries), add (store new entry), list (show all entries), delete (remove entry by key)

query.description: Search query string (required for search action). Matched against keywords and content using TF-IDF-like scoring.

content.description: The knowledge content to store (required for add action)

key.description: Unique identifier for the entry (required for add and delete actions)

name: memory-manager
description: Persistent key-value memory storage using a local JSON file. Store, retrieve, search, list, and delete entries with automatic timestamping.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: memory_manager
toolDefinition.description: Manage persistent memory entries stored in a local JSON file. Store key-value pairs, retrieve by key, search with fuzzy matching, list all entries, or delete entries.

action.description: The memory operation to perform. 'store' saves a key-value pair, 'retrieve' gets by exact key, 'search' performs fuzzy matching on keys and values, 'list' shows all entries, 'delete' removes an entry by key.

key.description: The memory key. Required for 'store', 'retrieve', and 'delete' actions.

value.description: The value to store. Required for the 'store' action.

query.description: Search query for fuzzy matching keys and values. Required for the 'search' action.

name: pdf-reader
description: Read and extract text content from PDF files. Uses raw buffer parsing to find text between BT/ET markers and decode stream objects without external dependencies.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: pdf_reader
toolDefinition.description: Read a PDF file and extract its text content. Works by parsing raw PDF structure to locate and decode text objects. Returns extracted text and document metadata.

filePath.description: Absolute or relative path to the PDF file to read

name: remind-me
description: In-memory reminder system. Set timed reminders, list active reminders, or cancel pending ones.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: remind_me
toolDefinition.description: Manage timed reminders. Set a new reminder with a delay, list all active reminders, or cancel a pending reminder by its ID.

action.description: The reminder action to perform. 'set' creates a new timed reminder, 'list' shows all active reminders, 'cancel' removes a pending reminder.

message.description: The reminder message. Required for the 'set' action.

delay.description: The delay before the reminder triggers. Required for the 'set' action.

unit.description: The time unit for the delay. Defaults to 'minutes' if not specified.

name: scheduler
description: Schedule, list, and manage recurring or one-off tasks using cron-like expressions. Tasks are stored in-memory and executed via setTimeout intervals.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: scheduler
toolDefinition.description: Create, list, or delete scheduled tasks. Tasks use cron-like expressions to define when they run and execute shell commands or log messages.

action.description: The scheduling operation: create (schedule a new task), list (show all tasks), delete (remove a task)

taskName.description: Unique name for the task (required for create and delete)

cronExpression.description: Cron-like expression defining the schedule. Supports: '*/N seconds' (every N seconds), '*/N minutes' (every N minutes), '*/N hours' (every N hours), 'once DELAY_SECONDS' (one-time after delay). Required for create action.

command.description: The command or message to execute when the task fires. Required for create action.

name: telegram-bot
description: Interact with the Telegram Bot API to send messages, get updates, and retrieve bot information.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: telegram_bot
toolDefinition.description: Interact with the Telegram Bot API. Send messages to chats, retrieve recent updates, or get bot profile information.

action.description: The Telegram Bot API action to perform. 'sendMessage' sends a message to a chat, 'getUpdates' retrieves recent incoming updates, 'getMe' returns basic info about the bot.

chatId.description: The target chat ID for sendMessage. Can be a numeric user/group ID or a @channel_username.

text.description: The message text to send when action is 'sendMessage'.

parseMode.description: Optional formatting mode for the message text. Supports 'Markdown', 'MarkdownV2', or 'HTML'.

name: web-search
description: Search the web using DuckDuckGo. Returns relevant search results with titles, URLs, and snippets. No API key required.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: web_search
toolDefinition.description: Search the web using DuckDuckGo and return relevant results with titles, URLs, and text snippets.

query.description: The search query string to look up on the web

maxResults.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 5, max: 20)

name: reddit-api-manager
description: Manage Reddit communities, post content, monitor mentions, and automate moderation tasks via the Reddit OAuth2 API.
author: claw2agent

name: x-twitter-api
description: Monitor, post, and reply on X/Twitter using the official API v2. Track mentions, hashtags, and competitor accounts.
author: claw2agent

name: linkedin-marketing-api
description: Post content, manage company pages, and run ad campaigns on LinkedIn via the official Marketing API.
author: claw2agent

name: tiktok-content-api
description: Publish and manage TikTok content, embed videos, and receive webhooks via the official TikTok Developer Portal.
author: claw2agent

name: instagram-graph-api
description: Publish posts, Reels, and Stories, manage comments and DMs via the official Meta Graph API for Instagram Business accounts.
author: claw2agent

name: youtube-data-api
description: Manage YouTube channels, upload videos, moderate comments, search content, and read analytics via the official API.
author: claw2agent

name: quora-zhihu-manager
description: Monitor questions, post answers, and build authority on Q&A platforms like Quora and Zhihu.
author: claw2agent

name: google-trends-api
description: Access Google Trends data for search interest over time, related queries, and regional breakdowns.
author: claw2agent

name: wordpress-rest-api
description: Create, read, update, and delete posts, pages, media, and comments on WordPress sites via the built-in REST API.
author: claw2agent

name: mailchimp-api
description: Manage email campaigns, audiences, automation workflows, and analytics via the official Mailchimp Marketing API.
author: claw2agent

name: email-validator
description: Validate email addresses via SMTP verification, detect disposable addresses and spam traps.
author: claw2agent

name: google-business-api
description: Read and respond to Google Maps reviews, manage business listings via the official Google Business Profile API.
author: claw2agent

name: meta-ad-library-api
description: Search the Meta Ad Library for public ads on Facebook and Instagram. Free, read-only transparency tool.
author: claw2agent

name: seo-optimizer
description: Optimize content for search engines with keyword analysis, meta tag generation, and readability scoring.
author: claw2agent

name: social-poster
description: Unified interface to post content to multiple social networks simultaneously. Supports scheduling and cross-platform formatting.
author: claw2agent

name: podcast-index-api
description: Search podcasts, retrieve episode metadata, and discover feed URLs via the community-funded Podcast Index API.
author: claw2agent

name: video-downloader
description: Download video and audio from 1000+ sites using yt-dlp. Supports format selection, subtitles, and metadata extraction.
author: claw2agent

name: whisper-transcribe
description: Speech-to-text transcription supporting 99+ languages. Available as local model or via OpenAI API.
author: claw2agent

name: pptx-generator
description: Create professional PowerPoint presentations programmatically with layouts, charts, images, and custom styling.
author: claw2agent

name: sentiment-analysis
description: Classify text sentiment as positive, negative, or neutral. Supports batch analysis and confidence scoring.
author: claw2agent

name: github-api
description: Full GitHub REST and GraphQL API for managing repositories, pull requests, issues, actions, and webhooks.
author: claw2agent

name: eslint-api
description: Programmatic JavaScript/TypeScript linting with configurable rules, auto-fix suggestions, and custom plugin support.
author: claw2agent

name: prettier-api
description: Programmatic code formatting for JavaScript, TypeScript, CSS, HTML, JSON, and more.
author: claw2agent

name: npm-audit-snyk
description: Scan project dependencies for known vulnerabilities, suggest fixes, and generate security reports.
author: claw2agent

name: ssh-client
description: Establish SSH connections, execute remote commands, and transfer files via SFTP.
author: claw2agent

name: docker-api
description: Manage Docker containers, images, volumes, and networks programmatically via the Docker Engine API.
author: claw2agent

name: playwright
description: Cross-browser automation for testing, screenshots, and web scraping. Supports Chromium, Firefox, and WebKit.
author: claw2agent

name: code-sandbox-e2b
description: Execute code in secure, isolated cloud sandboxes. Supports Python, JavaScript, and more.
author: claw2agent

name: test-generator
description: AI-powered test case generation for improved code coverage. Supports Jest, pytest, and more.
author: claw2agent

name: swagger-openapi-generator
description: Generate OpenAPI/Swagger documentation from code annotations, JSDoc comments, or TypeScript types.
author: claw2agent

name: log-monitor
description: Aggregate, parse, and monitor application logs. Detect error patterns and trigger alerts.
author: claw2agent

name: sql-analyzer
description: Analyze SQL queries for performance, suggest index optimizations, and explain execution plans.
author: claw2agent

name: i18n-tool
description: Automate internationalization: extract hardcoded strings, generate translation keys, and produce translations via LLM.
author: claw2agent

name: gmail-api
description: Read, send, and watch emails via the official Gmail API. Supports labels, threads, and push notifications.
author: claw2agent

name: outlook-microsoft-graph-api
description: Access Outlook email, calendar, and contacts via the Microsoft Graph API.
author: claw2agent

name: pdf-ocr-parser
description: Extract text from scanned PDFs and images using optical character recognition.
author: claw2agent

name: excel-api
description: Read, write, and manipulate Excel spreadsheets programmatically. Supports formulas, charts, and styling.
author: claw2agent

name: notion-api
description: Create and update Notion databases, pages, and blocks via the official Notion API.
author: claw2agent

name: crm-api-salesforce-hubspot
description: Read and write CRM data via Salesforce or HubSpot REST APIs. Manage contacts, deals, and pipelines.
author: claw2agent

name: pdf-compare
description: Compare PDF documents side-by-side, highlight textual and visual differences, and generate diff reports.
author: claw2agent

name: google-calendar-api
description: Read and write calendar events, manage recurring events, and check availability via the official Google Calendar API.
author: claw2agent

name: sms-sender-twilio
description: Send SMS and MMS messages programmatically via the Twilio API. Supports global delivery.
author: claw2agent

name: home-assistant-api
description: Control smart home devices, create automations, and read sensor data via the Home Assistant REST/WebSocket API.
author: claw2agent

name: weather-api
description: Get weather forecasts, current conditions, and historical data. Supports Open-Meteo (free, no key) and OpenWeatherMap.
author: claw2agent

name: plex-api
description: Manage Plex media libraries, control playback, organize collections, and monitor server health.
author: claw2agent

name: transmission-rpc
description: Manage BitTorrent downloads via the Transmission RPC API. Add, pause, remove torrents and monitor progress.
author: claw2agent

name: google-maps-api
description: Geocoding, directions, places search, and distance calculations via the Google Maps Platform.
author: claw2agent

name: calibre-api
description: Manage ebook libraries, convert formats, and edit metadata via Calibre REST wrapper.
author: claw2agent

name: frigate-nvr-api
description: Camera NVR with AI object detection via RTSP. Monitor cameras, detect people/vehicles, and manage recordings.
author: claw2agent

name: apple-health-parser
description: Parse Apple Health exported XML data for activity, sleep, heart rate, and nutrition analysis.
author: claw2agent

name: web-scraper
description: Extract data from websites using HTML parsing and browser-based scraping.
author: claw2agent

name: translator-deepl-google
description: Machine translation supporting 100+ languages via DeepL or Google Translate API.
author: claw2agent

name: chart-generator
description: Create data visualizations and charts from datasets. Supports bar, line, pie, scatter, and more.
author: claw2agent

name: image-generation
description: Generate images from text prompts using DALL-E, Flux, or Stable Diffusion.
author: claw2agent

name: music-generator
description: Generate music tracks from text descriptions using AI models.
author: claw2agent

name: video-editor-ffmpeg
description: Programmatic video editing  trim, merge, transcode, add subtitles and effects using FFmpeg.
author: claw2agent

name: prompt-generator
description: Generate and optimize prompts for image generation models.
author: claw2agent

name: image-upscaler
description: Upscale images 2x-4x using AI super-resolution models.
author: claw2agent

name: color-palette-extractor
description: Extract dominant colors from images and generate harmonious color palettes.
author: claw2agent

name: binance-api
description: Trade crypto, check balances, and stream real-time market data via the Binance REST and WebSocket API.
author: claw2agent

name: etherscan-api
description: Query Ethereum blockchain data  wallet balances, transactions, token transfers, and smart contract ABIs.
author: claw2agent

name: defi-llama-api
description: Access DeFi protocol TVL, yield, and token data across chains. Free, no key required.
author: claw2agent

name: finnhub-api
description: Real-time stock quotes, company fundamentals, earnings data, and economic indicators.
author: claw2agent

name: coinbase-api
description: Trade crypto, check balances, and manage wallets via the Coinbase Advanced Trade API.
author: claw2agent

name: arxiv-api
description: Search and retrieve academic papers from arXiv  full metadata, abstracts, and PDF download links.
author: claw2agent

name: semantic-scholar-api
description: Search academic papers by keyword, author, or DOI. Access citation networks, references, and paper embeddings.
author: claw2agent

name: citation-generator
description: Generate properly formatted academic citations in APA, MLA, Chicago, IEEE, and other styles.
author: claw2agent

name: minecraft-bot-controller
description: Control Minecraft bots for building, farming, and exploration using the Mineflayer API.
author: claw2agent

name: ollama-local-llm
description: Run open-source LLMs locally via Ollama  Llama, Mistral, Gemma, and more. Fully offline capable.
author: claw2agent

name: vision-model
description: Analyze images using AI vision models. Identify objects, read text, describe scenes, and extract structured data.
author: claw2agent
